turns.ai_line: Good morning, doctor. I dey feel serious stomach pain since I chop leftover rice yesterday. I dey also get nausea and diarrhea, and I dey wonder if na because of the heat for this area wey dey make food spoil quickly.
Doctor, I dey really worry say the rice don spoil before I chop am. The heat for this area no dey help at all. Wetin you think fit happen?
Doctor, I dey beg, make you help me check wetin fit cause this problem. The way my belle dey do me no be small matter. You think say I fit get food poisoning?
turns.user_input: Yeah, might be food poisoning from the rice you ate
